features: 【Excellent Noise Cancellation】Leettus Wireless lavalier microphone quipped 2 plush windproof covers and 4pcs replacement Sponge heads,microphone equipped with built-in noise reduction tools to remove low-frequency noise and preserve high-frequency vocals,providing a pure recording effect.🚫Not compatible with USB-C for iPhone15 and above!The paired data cable is used for microphone-charging,not for the receiver.🚫

【Stable transmission】The microphone for iphone provide stable transmission within 65 feet under No obstacles environment .Suitable for various scenarios, such as game live streaming, recording videos, and online meetings.

【7 Hour Long Battery Life】Wireless microphone for iphone enjoy 7 hours of working time when fully charged.Receiver have a charging port for direct charging while working at the same time, perfect for outside interview video podcast vlog and never need to worry about the battery life.

【Product compatibility】The Wireless lavalier mini mic is only compatible with iPhone/iPad,and the system needs to be at least version 12 of iOS. Not compatible with with USB-C/Camera/andorid devices.When one of the microphones runs out of power,you can replace it with another one while charging the out of power microphone.

【One key automatic pairing】Plug in the receiver for your phone and turn on the microphone power to achieve automatic pairing.(Note: If the match is not successful, don't worry, just shut down the device and try again)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Program Interview 2 Video Recording

Will this works with my iphone case box? Or require me to remove case make this to fit? That's not necessary. If your phone case does not interfere with the use of the charger, it will not affect the microphone either. What is included in the box of this wireless microphone product? One receiver,two microphones,two plush microphone sleeves,four sponge microphone sleeves,one Type-C data cable and one instruction manual. What if my phone cannot pair with the wireless microphone for iPhone? Please unplug and Insert the receiver and pair again.If you still cannot pair, please open your phone lock screen,unplug and Insert the receiver. What system is this wireless microphone suitable for? Is it suitable for Android phones? The wireless microphone requires an IOS12 or higher system.Attention! This product is not suitable for Android! How to determine if the product is damaged or the system is outdated when the microphone is not working? Please go to [Settings] - [About Phone] on your phone to check if the word 'DOCK' exists? If it exists, it indicates that the link was successful. Please upgrade the system. If it does not exist, it indicates that the microphone is damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Performance and Convenience
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of testing and using the wireless lavalier microphone, and I must say it has exceeded all my expectations. From its remarkable sound quality to its exceptional convenience, this microphone has proven to be an outstanding tool for various audio recording applications. Here's why it deserves high praise:Crystal Clear Sound Quality: The wireless lavalier microphone captures audio with remarkable clarity and fidelity. Whether used for professional recordings, interviews, presentations, or even casual vlogging, this microphone delivers exceptional audio reproduction. The sound is rich, well-balanced, and free from distortion, making it a joy to listen to and work with in post-production.Reliable Wireless Performance: The wireless functionality of this lavalier microphone is truly impressive. Its robust transmission range ensures a stable connection, eliminating the need to worry about signal dropouts or interference. Even when moving around, the microphone consistently maintains a strong and uninterrupted connection, providing peace of mind during important recordings.User-Friendly Design: The microphone's design is both sleek and user-friendly. The compact and lightweight transmitter and receiver make it easy to wear and carry, ensuring maximum comfort during extended use. The controls are intuitively placed, allowing for quick adjustments to volume levels and channel settings without interrupting the recording process.Versatility and Flexibility: This wireless lavalier microphone offers exceptional versatility, making it suitable for a wide range of applications. Whether you're a content creator, journalist, filmmaker, or presenter, this microphone adapts effortlessly to your needs. The included accessories, such as the windscreen and belt clip, further enhance its usability, enabling you to record outdoors or in demanding environments.Long Battery Life: The microphone's battery life is truly impressive. With its energy-efficient design, it offers extended operating time, allowing for long recording sessions without the worry of running out of power. The convenient battery life indicator keeps you informed about the remaining power, so you can plan accordingly.Excellent Value for Money: Considering its outstanding performance and features, this wireless lavalier microphone offers excellent value for money. It competes admirably with higher-priced alternatives on the market, providing professional-grade audio quality at a fraction of the cost.In conclusion, the wireless lavalier microphone has truly impressed me with its exceptional sound quality, reliability, user-friendly design, versatility, and excellent value for money. Whether you're a professional or a content creator looking to elevate your audio recordings, this microphone is a top-notch choice. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a high-quality wireless lavalier microphone for their audio recording needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Performance with the Wireless Lavalier Microphone Kit!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this wireless Lavalier microphone kit, and I am thoroughly impressed! The kit includes two microphones, a transmitter, and a short charging cable - everything needed for a seamless audio experience.The charging interface is Type C, a modern and convenient choice. It charges quickly and efficiently, making it perfect for on-the-go use. The less than 0.01 seconds latency is practically imperceptible, ensuring that my recordings and live performances are in perfect sync with no delays.The audio signal transmission range is another standout feature. With up to 65 feet of clear transmission, I can move around without worrying about losing audio quality or connection. This is particularly beneficial for dynamic presentations or when recording in large spaces.Moreover, the endurance of these microphones is impressive. With close to 6 hours of continuous use on a single charge, I can conduct long recording sessions or events without the concern of the microphones dying on me.The audio quality itself is crystal clear, capturing every nuance of the voice without any interference or noise. The convenience of having two microphones allows for versatile usage, be it for interviews, podcasts, or dual presentations.Overall, this kit is a fantastic investment for anyone looking for mobile, reliable, user-friendly audio equipment. It's definitely enhanced my audio recording capabilities, and I highly recommend it to hobbyists who are searching for recording equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Mic!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this wireless mic for youtube videos and instagram, and it's amazing! The sound quality? Crystal clear, no static or weird echoes. I've used it in big rooms and outdoors, and it never loses signal. Plus, it's so easy to set up – literally just plug in and start talking. It looks sleek and has survived a few drops, so it's definitely sturdy. The battery life is a winner too; it lasts forever on a single charge. If you need a solid, hassle-free mic, this is the one to get. Totally worth it! 🎤✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It just works!
reviews.reviewText: It's truly a plug and play gadget. I charged it up, plug it into my iPad, clip the lavalier microphone onto my shirt and start talking using the voice recorder app on the iPad. It just works without any additional installation or configuration. I even walked to a different room and whispered to the microphone to see if I would still hear it in the recording. After hearing what I recorded it was crystal clear, no distortion or crackling, and the whispers came through with no issues. The clip-on mic is very small, light, and compact, comfortable to wear. You can hide it in your shirt while doing interviews, which by the way, includes two mics perfect for two people interviews making your video more professional. The receiver is connected to the lightning input of your iPhone or iPad and it's light and compact not bulky at all. The receiver also have a lightning input to charge your phone as a bonus convenient. Overall it is a good buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best cheap set I have tried. Great starter.
reviews.reviewText: these are cheap don't get me wrong but they work. Sound is very good with the provided foam, but with the wind sock there are some chirps, weird audio like overly processed and hiccups I assume the sock is doing something that the noise cancellation gets wrong so stick to the foam unless it is that windy where you would really need them. They feel good not like some of the other cheap plastic ones. Clips don't move to reposition them better but overall they are good. I have tried a lot of these and for the 20$ price area these are the best Ive tried at this price. There are far better but not at this price. Great starters.
